lines.1: Name of the site : Nantral Platform
lines.3: Owner : Association des √âtudiants de l'√âcole Centrale de Nantes

lines.1: ASSOCIATION DES √âTUDIANTS DE L'√âCOLE CENTRALE DE NANTES
lines.2: √âcole Centrale de Nantes, 1 rue de la No√´, 44300 Nantes

lines.6: Head office : 2 rue Kellermann - 59100 Roubaix - France

lines.1: Unless stated otherwise, all the elements accessible on the site (texts, images, logos, icons, sounds, software, etc.) remain the exclusive property of their authors, with regard to intellectual property rights or rights of use.
lines.2: Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, adaptation of all or part of the elements of the site, whatever the means or process used, is prohibited, except with the prior written authorization of the author.
lines.3: Any unauthorized exploitation of the site or any element it contains is considered to constitute an infringement and prosecuted.
lines.4: The trademarks and logos reproduced on the site are registered by the companies that own them.

paragraphs.6: Only a session cookie is used on the site and expires after 14 days.
paragraphs.7: The contents on this site may include contents from external sources (for instance videos, images, ...). These embedded contents act in the same way as if the visitor had visited the original site from where this content is based. These sites may therefore use additional cookies.
paragraphs.8: When you register on the site, the personal data you send us will be stored and kept by the Association des √âtudiants de l'√âcole Centrale de Nantes until you request the deletion of your user account using the contact form.

register.EmailECN: I have an Centrale Nantes email
register.canCreateTemporaryAccount: In this case you can create a temporary account with your personal email. NB: This account give you access to Nantral Platform for a limited period of time, make sure to change it as soon as you have access to your @ec-nantes email
register.canNotCreateAccount: In this case, you cannot create an account on Nantral Platform. You can, however, create a temporary account if you have an invitation link (available on the Onboard home page during the summer, for example).
register.clickOnLink: Click on the link in the email and login to access your account.
register.confirmationEmailSent: A confirmation e-mail has been sent to you to confirm your e-mail address at {{email}}
register.createdAccountIsTemporary: You can create a Nantral Platform account with your personal email address, however you will need to enter your address @ec-nantes.fr as soon as you have access to it.

haveECNEmail.canContinue: If you have access to your Centrale Nantes address (ending with ec-nantes.fr), you can continue your registration
haveECNEmail.no: No, I don't have access to my Centrale Nantes address yet.
haveECNEmail.question: Do I have a Centrale Nantes email?
haveECNEmail.yes: Yes I have an email at Centrale Nantes

register.invalidInvitation: The invitation link provided is invalid. Make sure it is correct.
register.passwordHelperText: Your password must contain at least 7 characters.
register.signUpEmailRequirement: To sign up for Nantral Platform, you have to be currently at Centrale Nantes. To verify it, we use your email address that should end with @eleves.ec-nantes.fr or @ec-nantes.fr.
register.usernameHelp: Choose wisely. You will not be able to change this later!
register.waitAFewMinutes: Wait a few minutes, this can sometimes take a long time.

resetPassword.emailHelperText: Email associated with your Nantral Platform account
resetPassword.emailSent: An email has been sent to reset your password. If you don't receive anything, wait a few minutes it can sometimes take some time.
resetPassword.provideEmail: Please provide your email, we'll send you a link to reset your password.
resetPassword.youCanNowLogin: You can now login with your new password
